title: She Hurts Like Tequila
lyrics:
She's a feeling like I've never known
She's a fire burning down in my soul
And it takes over my body and mind
Until I've lost all control
Every taste of her heavenly lips
Is laced with her wickedness
No drink from a bottle could get me that high
She hurts like tequila

I'm hypnotized by the pale moonlight
Dancin' there on her skin
And I know it's a reckless obsession
But here I go again, yeah

Ella me hace sentir mejor
Borrachito traigo el corazón
Sé bien que me hace mal
Pues la cruda moral nomás no la cura el alcohol
Con sus besos se va el estrés
Y pone mi mundo al revés
No puedo negar que un día me va a matar
She hurts like tequila
Every taste of her heavenly lips
Is laced with her wickedness
And no drink from a bottle could get me that high
She hurts like tequila

Y no puedo negar que un día me va a matar
She hurts like tequila
